summary: Comprehensive testing of predictive maintenance app - All 3 critical bugs fixed and verified. Backend: 16/16 tests passed. Frontend: All pages load correctly, AI features working.

issues: Route is /ai-analytics-simulation not /ai-simulation - sidebar link works correctly

Backend uses MongoDB only (PostgreSQL optional). LLM key configured in backend/.env.
